title: 10 ways to speed up your internet connection today
description: Is your slow internet connection getting you down? Here's how to fix the most common issues.

title: Is your iPhone charging slower? Turn off this default power setting now
description: The new Clean Energy Charging setting prioritizes cleaner energy production at the expense of faster charging. Here's how to turn it off for when you're in need of that speed.

title: Southwest Airlines has a controversial new idea to make customers sing a different tune
description: Airlines are all thinking about new ways to use technology. This one is, well, certainly different.

title: Starbucks took a disturbing lesson from Delta Air Lines and now there's trouble
description: It's rarely worth engaging customer emotions and then changing your tune.

title: The best March Madness apps of 2023: NCAA, ESPN, CBS
description: Ready for March Madness? Here are the best apps to for you keep track of the tournament and your bracket.
